summary: Implements the prior pipeline for the Kandinsky V2.2 model, managing initialization and loading from configuration files or pretrained checkpoints to generate latent representations used in subsequent image generation steps.
business_intent: Offer a plug‑and‑play component that prepares the prior stage of Kandinsky V2.2 text‑to‑image generation, enabling developers to quickly load and configure the model for producing image embeddings or latent codes.
